homepage.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
homepage.tagline: Embodied Intelligence in the Real World
homepage.description: A comprehensive guide to building intelligent humanoid robots with ROS 2, AI perception, and reinforcement learning
homepage.step1Desc: Understand fundamentals through simple joint manipulation
homepage.step2Desc: Simulate robot navigation with obstacle avoidance
homepage.step3Desc: Train locomotion policies using reinforcement learning
homepage.ctaDescription: Join thousands of developers learning to build intelligent robots that interact with the physical world.

features.ros2Desc: Master the Robot Operating System 2, the backbone of modern robotics. Learn nodes, topics, services, and more through hands-on tutorials.
features.digitalTwinDesc: Create and control virtual robots in Gazebo and Unity. Build realistic simulations before deploying to physical hardware.
features.aiPerceptionDesc: Integrate NVIDIA Isaac Sim for advanced computer vision, navigation, and AI-driven decision making in robotics.
features.vlaDesc: Build robots that understand and act on natural language commands. Bridge the gap between human communication and robot actions.
features.rlDesc: Train intelligent locomotion policies using cutting-edge RL techniques. Teach robots to walk, run, and navigate complex environments.
features.hardwareDesc: Deploy your skills on real robots. Learn to work with actuators, sensors, and embedded systems for physical AI applications.
